document_data.name: the Dream Brigade
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dream Brigade''' was a military organization within the [[Sevenfold Mazework]] of the [[Great Dismal Delve]].
document_data.Activities: These fanatics were used to crush slave rebellions or as fodder to blunt attacks from elemental creatures.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Sevenfold Mazework within the Great Dismal Delve served as base of all dao military organizations.
